h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Sunset of the Nine Skies Location
content: The Sunset of the Nine Skies drink can be found in the Temple of the Yellow Flowers, Court of Illumination area in The Webbed Hollow. From the Shrine, pass the two Doaist enemies at the entrance and follow the path through the cliffside. Once you reach a tree trunk ahead at the top of a hill, take a left up some more stairs and follow the path to the end, to find a hut with the Drink.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Sunset_of_the_Nine_Skies.md', within the main section titled 'Sunset of the Nine Skies', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Sunset of the Nine Skies Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Sunset of the Nine Skies drink can be found in the Temple of the Yellow Flowers, Court of Illumination area in The Webbed Hollow. From the Shrine, pass the two Doaist enemies at the entrance and follow the path through the cliffside. Once you reach a tree trunk ahead at the top of a hill, take a left up some more stairs and follow the path to the end, to find a hut with the Drink.
